explanation: [0-0] A young woman in a red and black dress is standing in a room, and a man in a white shirt is standing behind her. The room has an air conditioner, white curtains and a pink neon light. The woman faces the front, raises her left hand and smiles. There is a mobile phone on a tripod on the right side. There is a hand under the mobile phone, and the mobile phone screen synchronously shows the picture of the woman.

[0-6] Then the young woman in the red and black dress waved her left hand, and the mobile phone screen displayed a countdown of "3, 2, 1". After the countdown, the man stood behind the woman, hugged her from behind and began to do dance moves together.

[6-15] Then the man put his hands on the woman's chin, then clenched his hands into fists, and then spread his hands together. Then his hands spread out and rotated clockwise. Then the man's hands kept changing their movements in front of the woman. At the same time, the mobile phone screen on the tripod is also synchronizing the actions of the two people. Finally, the man put his right hand on the woman's chin and his left arm on the woman's waist. The woman lowered her head slightly, opened her mouth slightly and looked forward.
